uiw.abstract - MATLAB File Help
uiw.abstract
Contents of uiw.abstract package:

             AppWindow - Base class for an app's traditional figure window
         BaseContainer - Base class for a container
            BaseDialog - Base class for building dialog windows
            BaseFigure - Base class for a traditional figure used for an app
             BaseLabel - Base class for a Widget Label
             BasePanel - Mixin class for a base uipanel and font properties
  EditablePopupControl - Base class for a popup control with editable text
   EditableTextControl - Base class for an editable text control
EditableTextWithButton - Base class for an editable field with a button
           JavaControl - Base class for widgets with a Java control
      JavaEditableText - Base class for JAVA editable text widgets
       MultiSessionApp - Base class for app that saves state to MAT file
     SessionManagement - Base class for app with session management
      SingleSessionApp - Base class for app that saves state to MAT file
       WidgetContainer - Base class for a graphical widget
